features1.title: Centralized Inventory Management
features1.description: Enables real-time tracking of vehicle inventory, including acquisition, sales, and stock levels.

features1.title: Service and Repair Management
features1.description: Service and Repair Management Streamlines service scheduling, parts ordering, and maintenance history tracking.

features2.title: Sales and Customer Relationship Management (CRM)
features2.description: Facilitates lead tracking, customer profiling, and sales pipeline management.

features2.title: Reporting and Analytics
features2.description: Provides insightful reports and analytics on various dealership operations for data-driven decision-making.

features2.title: Finance and Accounting Integration
features2.description: Integrates with financial systems to automate invoicing, payroll, and financial reporting. Linking with financial system like Tally.
